nodes.text: The Assembly House was where the Government Assembly, the republic of the Bith species, convened. It was located in the city of Weogar, the cultural center of the planet Clak'dor VII.

Each of Clak'dor's city-states sent representatives to the Government Assembly. Although the city-states varied in their methods of selecting representatives, from election to hereditary appointment, all were equal in the Assembly House.
